channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- User Role by BestWebSoft

item.title: CVE-2023-0820|2023-04-03T14:38:25.817Z -- unknown -- user%20role%20by%20bestwebsoft
item.description: The User Role by BestWebSoft WordPress plugin before 1.6.7 does not protect against CSRF in requests to update role capabilities, leading to arbitrary privilege escalation of any role.
